text: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages.
CSS is a computer language for laying out and structuring web pages.
JavaScript is a scripting language that enables you to create dynamically updating content.
Java is a object-oriented language that can be used as a platform in itself.
Spring is a Java framework created with the aim of facilitating application development.
Python is a programming language widely used in web applications, software development and more.
MySQL is a database management system that uses the SQL language as an interface.
PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system, developed as an open source project.
